name: Espresso
details: A classic Italian coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
details: A popular coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

name: Latte
details: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a light layer of foam.

name: Iced Coffee
details: Chilled brewed coffee served over ice, often with added milk or sweeteners.

name: Mocha
details: A delightful mix of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.

name: Cold Brew
details: Coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period, resulting in a smooth and less acidic flavor.
